titleStmt.title: 1588. A sermon preached on the queenes day. Beeing the 17. of Nouember. 1587. at the towne of Lidd in Kent, by Isaac Colfe, preacher of the word of God
titleStmt.author: Colfe, Isaac, 1558 or 9-1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, for Harry Carre, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Church yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church yard.
